author: jstrachan
msg: Added HttpServetRequest and HttpServletResponse implementation classes ready for the Messagelet dispatcher which is capable of dispatching to a HTTP style servlet such as JSP

author: jstrachan
msg: Adding an example Servlet and Messagelet

author: jstrachan
msg: Got Message dispatching to Generic Servlets and to Messagelets working fine, servlets can use the input from a source message (only TextMessage supported so far) and respond which will produce a TextMessage back again. The EchoServlet, EchoMessagelet and EchoMDO are all working properly in the example web application

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed bug in the Digester caused by the package reorganisation and got the first Messagelet working

author: jstrachan
msg: Reorganised the Messagelet code base to make it easier to follow; the messagelet package now contains just the public APIs and useful base classes. All the implementation code is now in the seperate impl package to make things simpler to follow. Also the first example Messagelet now runs, EchoMessagelet gets called correctly in Tomcat 4.0 though still the streams need to be wired together along with an inbuilt replyTo code so that simple servlets can be written to generate text responses
